name: A formidable helmet, masterfully crafted from the mightiest terracarapid shell
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has awesome armour class for its type (poor in general).
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
The helmet is made from the shell of the mighty Carapaxus.
The helmet offers superior defense from stuns.
